params.text: I AM NOT AFRAID
I am a big girl. I can leave the house alone.
It is so dark! Is someone there? Who is it?
Oh, it is only the cat. I am not afraid.
I can see a big dark thing outside! What is it?
Oh, it is only the well. I am not afraid.
And that sound! Creak creak creak! What is it?
Only my sister drawing water from the well! I am not afraid.
I hear footsteps! Who is it?
It is my mother. She has come home from the fields.
I am a big girl now.
I am not afraid of anything!

"I am not afraid" credits

This work, "I am not afraid", is a derivative of "I am not afraid" written by Mini Shrinivasan . © Pratham Books , 2013 and used under CC BY.  This work, "I am not afraid" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Deborah Oduman
